mapper.select: SELECT CB.CARD_NO, SUBSTR(CARD_BENEFIT_DIVISION, 1, LENGTH(CARD_BENEFIT_DIVISION) - 2) AS CARD_BENEFIT_DIVISION , CB.CARD_BENEFIT_DETAIL, CB.CARD_PERCENTAGE FROM CARD_BENEFIT CB JOIN CARD C ON C.CARD_NO = CB.CARD_NO JOIN MINUS_CATEGORY MC ON C.CATEGORY_NO = MC.CATEGORY_NO ORDER BY C.CARD_NO, CB.CARD_PERCENTAGE DESC

SELECT CB.CARD_NO, CB.CARD_BENEFIT_DIVISION, CB.CARD_BENEFIT_DETAIL, CB.CARD_PERCENTAGE FROM CARD_BENEFIT CB JOIN CARD C ON C.CARD_NO = CB.CARD_NO WHERE CB.CARD_NO = #{cardNo} ORDER BY C.CARD_NO, CB.CARD_PERCENTAGE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CARD_BENEFIT (CARD_BENEFIT_NO, CARD_NO, CARD_BENEFIT_DIVISION, CARD_BENEFIT_DETAIL, CARD_PERCENTAGE) VALUES (CARD_BENEFIT_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{cardNo}, #{cardBenefitDivision}, #{cardBenefitDetail}, #{cardPercentage})
mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(CARD_BENEFIT_DIVISION, 1, LENGTH(CARD_BENEFIT_DIVISION) - 2) AS CARD_BENEFIT_DIVISION, CB.CARD_PERCENTAGE FROM CARD_BENEFIT CB JOIN CARD C ON CB.CARD_NO = C.CARD_NO JOIN SELLING_CARD SC ON C.CARD_NO = SC.CARD_NO WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
